pf object constructor

pf.Rd

pf object constructor

Usage

pf(x = pfc(), pf_column = "phlo", ...)

Arguments

x

a pfc object

pf_column

Name of the column to hold x. Default: 'phlo'

...

Reserved for future extensions. Not used.

Value

a pf object

Examples

pf(rpfc(100))
#> # A tibble: 198 × 3
